data.name: sendreqmsg
data.value: Click here to send request to Inogic to buy/renew/extend license for this product

data.name: licexpmsg
data.value: Your license has expired, please click on Send Request button to upgrade your subscription.

data.name: filleddetail
data.value: Details filled in the License Registration section will be transferred to www.inogic.com. Do you wish to proceed?

data.value: Please provide all the required details before proceeding ahead.

data.name: recnotfound

data.value: Click here to activate this product

data.name: assignRoleMsg
data.value: Assign Maplytics roles to the users.

data.name: dcrnfmsg
data.value: Your Maplytics Configuration record has been deleted. Click on Setting --> License Registration --> Click on Activate button to create the record or Please register using license file.

data.name: entityRecCreateMsg
data.value: Dashboard and Entity Map records successfully configured.

data.name: sampleRecCreateMsg
data.value: Selected records have been created/updated successfully.

data.name: selSampleRecMsg
data.value: Please select at least one record to be updated.

data.name: configurationmsg
data.value: License created successfully. To complete the configuration process please ensure following points: 1. Click on 'Configure' button to configure Maplytics settings. This will take approximately 5 minutes. 2. Add the required members to Team Maplytics.

data.name: licLimit
data.value: We activate the trial license only for 300 users. If you want to activate it for more users please contact crm@inogic.com .

data.name: congdeactive
data.value: Configuration Record is deactivated. Activate record to continue.

data.name: bkmsg
data.value: Your Maplytics Configuration record has been deleted.Please register using License File.

data.value: You do not have enough privileges to perform the requested operation.

data.value: No Personalized Records created for users.

data.value: This action will override all the user personalizations and apply default configuration to all the user personalization records.

data.value:
This action will override all the user personalizations and apply default configuration to all the user personalization records.
You can’t undo this action. Do you want to continue?

data.value: (Notify User and Inogic about issues regarding licensing.)

data.name: tpto
data.value: Select the user to whom the Notification email should go.

data.name: tpnotifyinogic
data.value: If this is checked then an Account will be created in your CRM with name “Inogic” and email address as crm@inogic.com. Notification email will also be send to Inogic at crm@inogic.com.

data.name: tpnotifyinterval
data.value: How often to do you want to send the notification email?
